title: Introduction to PON
content:
Definition: PON = Fiber network + No active components (only passive splitters).
Purpose: Cost-effective last-mile connectivity.
Key Feature: Point-to-multipoint architecture.
narration: PON ek fiber network hai jo ISP se tumhare ghar tak internet, TV, aur voice signals bhejta hai, bina kisi amplifier ya active device ke! Bas passive splitters ka use hota hai.

title: PON Architecture
image_desc: Fiber optic cable diagram. Type: diagram
narration:
PON ka setup simple hai:

OLT (ISP ke paas),

Splitter (jo signal ko 2-64 users mein baant deta hai),

ONT (tumhare router se juda hota hai)."

title: Wavelengths in PON
image_desc: PON network architecture diagram. Type: diagram
narration:
PON teen rang (wavelengths) ka use karta hai:

1490 nm: Download (Internet/Voice),

1310 nm: Upload (Tumhara data ISP tak),

1550 nm: TV (Linear channels).

title: Power Splitting
content:
Math: Power per user = P/N (N = split ratio).
Example: 1:16 split → Each gets 1/16th power.
narration: Agar splitter 1:32 hai, toh har user ko P/32 power milega. Matlab, jyada users = kam signal strength! Isliye PON mein 20 km ki limit hoti hai

title: 4 Types of PON
image_desc: Optical power splitter diagram. Type: diagram
narration:
PON ke chaar types hain:

GPON (Sabse famous, 2.5 Gbps speed),

EPON (Simple, Ethernet use karta hai),

APON (Purana, ATM pe chalta tha),

WDM-PON (Har user ko alag wavelength).

title: Advantages of PON
content:
Why PON?

Cost-saving: No electricity in splitters.
Long-range: 20 km coverage.
image_desc: Fiber optic splitter configurations. Type: diagram
narration:
PON kyu accha hai?

Maintenance kam (passive hai, toh kharab nahi hota),

Speed high (4K/8K streaming aaram se),

Upgradeable (Aage 10G PON possible hai).

title: PON Limitations
content:
Shared upstream: Like a highway with traffic.
Split limits: Practical max = 1:32 or 1:64.
image_desc: PON implementation techniques comparison. Type: chart
narration:
PON ke drawbacks:

Upload speed shared (sab users 1310 nm pe bhejte hain),

Signal kamzor ho jata hai (agar 64 users ek splitter pe hain),

Hacking risk (theoretically possible).

title: Summary of PON
content:
PON = Passive splitters + No mid-span power,

Key wavelengths: 1490nm↓, 1310nm↑, 1550nm↓,

Topology: Tree (OLT → Splitter → ONTs).
Standards: GPON > EPON > APON.
image_desc: Fiber optic network illustration. Type: illustration
narration:
Exam ke liye yaad rakho:

PON = Passive splitters + Beech mein koi current nahi,

Wavelengths: 1490nm (download), 1310nm (upload), 1550nm (TV),

GPON abhi sabse zyada use hota hai."
